Power.Name: Power
Power.Description: True power is that which is exerted over others

Vigilance.Name: Vigilance
Vigilance.Description: Our world is dictated by what our mind will allow us to see

Resolution.Name: Resolution
Resolution.Description: The only being to which we must prove our abilities is ourselves

Stamina.Name: Stamina
Stamina.Description: It is not enough to will it, our bodies must be capable of doing to succeed

Insight.Name: Insight
Insight.Description: Knowledge itself is useless without the insight to apply it
Insight.Effect: Essence recovers more durability on weapons

Revival.Name: Revival
Revival.Description: Know what it is like to look death in the eyes and command him to back down
Revival.Effect: Gain a second wind when you take fatal damage

Apathy.Name: Apathy
Apathy.Description: When your life depends on the loss of another, you can begin to relish death

Finesse.Name: Finesse
Finesse.Description: Mastering your tools is to take control of your fate
Finesse.Requirement: Reload on empty magazine num times
Finesse.Effect: Automatically reload when magazine is empty

Ingenuity.Name: Ingenuity
Ingenuity.Requirement: Kill num enemy with last round
Ingenuity.Effect: Instantly reload if the last round kills an enemy

Scavenging.Name: Scavenging
Scavenging.Description: No land is barren to the eyes of the scavenger

Hunting.Name: Hunting
Hunting.Description: The greatest prey wait only for the worthy hunters

Divining.Name: Divining
Divining.Description: To the diviners, the earth herself offers up her blood

Fire.Name: Fire
Fire.Description: No other beast feeds off the life of another as fire
Fire.Effect: Occasionally explode with fire on taking damage

Shattering.Name: Shattering
Shattering.Description: All armour is only as strong as it's weakest part
Shattering.Effect: Occasionally explode with decay on taking damage

Sickness.Name: Sickness
Sickness.Effect: Killing sick enemies spreads it to nearby enemies

Mastery.Name: Mastery
Mastery.Description: Wisdom is but knowledge tempered by years of experience
Mastery.Effect: Small chance for free skill activation
